post:
Hi there!

We are glad to offer our limited low end dedicated servers to the community!

We have **only 9 servers** of the following configuration:

CPU: **Intel Xeon X3430**

Cores: **4c/8t 2.4/2.8Ghz**

RAM: **8GB  DDR3**

Storage: **1TB SATA**

Bandwidth: **100Mbps Unmetered**

The price is only **$49 monthly**!
Order now: https://secure.vstoike.ru/?cmd=cart&action=add&id=54

Learn more about our [infrastructure](https://vstoike.ru/en/infrastructure) and [network](https://vstoike.ru/en/network).

And as always we are happy to answer any questions)
